title: Futuristic SciFi UI SFX
description: The Futuristic SciFi UI SFX pack is created to immerse your audience within a surreal Sci-Fi experience right from the get go. This package comes with over 100 bleeps and bloops to set the correct tone as if in a SciFi environment or inside a spaceship!
longDescription: The Futuristic SciFi UI SFX asset pack is made to immerse your audience in a futuristic Sci-Fi atmosphere before entering the full game or project. These SFX's will set the tone of the environment your users can expect to be in right from the main user interface. Having an overall tone and theme that is consistent though out your project is key to the overall users experience. Using the Futuristic Sci-Fi UI SFX pack will immediately place your audience in the surreal futuristic atmosphere you are looking for.
technicalDetails:
DEMO LINK HERE

https://soundcloud.com/pro-audiosfx/futuristic-scifi-ui-sfx-demo?si=12bc8c4b27b541128b4049f4b3de64a6&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


This asset pack consist's of 3 main folders of Sci-Fi UI sound sets

  •  SCIFI FUTURISTIC UI VERSION 1
  •  SCIFI FUTURISTIC UI VERSION 2
  •  SCIFI FUTURISTIC UI BLEEP AND BLOOPS 

Number of Audio Waves: 105

Number of Audio Cues: 105

Sample rate / bit rate: 96,000 Hz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 0:51

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
